featured.text: Since many of our house plants are from humid jungle environments, they need _____ air to keep them green and healthy.
Rivers and streams flow slowly through jungles of shaded greens.

definition.zh_def: 叢林，一種茂密的熱帶森林，通常生長著多種植物和動物。
definition.en_def: A dense, tropical forest that is home to a variety of plants and animals.
definition.example: The explorers ventured deep into the jungle to discover new species.
